chunks.chunk_text: 想知道薪水入帳後該如何管理投資新手又該何時入場出國旅遊怎麼玩追什麼我是蔡尚樺邀請您來收聽玉山銀行全新Podcast玉山學堂在這裡我將和不同世代的來賓一起聊投資談消費分享最實用的理財觀念讓理財不只是數字而是更輕鬆更有趣的生活方式現在就點擊連結收聽一起開啟幸福人生
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_2024回顧星期天LBS - 紐約相關時事趣聞 All about New York.json

chunks.chunk_text: Hello 同情家族歡迎收聽Look Back Sunday在這個節目John老師會彙整過去不同國家與主題的熱門跟讀文章讓你可以在15分鐘內吸收最精華的世界時事趣聞Let's get right to it

chunks.chunk_text: He's a construction worker from Queenswho's lived in the city most of his lifeHe always liked reading the comicsand the horoscope in the newsHow long since he last bought a copy of the paperHosspot laughedI would say like 15 yearsCamel Brown is another archetypal customerfor New York's hometown newspaperas the daily news styles itself

chunks.chunk_text: He's a maintenance workerfor the Metropolitan Transportation AuthorityHe's 55 years oldHe grew up buying the paperfor his grandmother in BrooklynWhen she was finished reading itI'd pick it upflip backand start with the sportsBrown saidHe doesn't remember the last time he bought itWhen he paged through a copy at a friend's homethis past weekHe was unimpressedTristan Dominguez

chunks.chunk_text: 他知道他們在做什麼,Rosanne Nunziata
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_2024回顧星期天LBS - 紐約相關時事趣聞 All about New York.json

chunks.chunk_text: Dumplings tempt New Yorkers with pizza, peanut butter flavors and no human contact
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_2024回顧星期天LBS - 紐約相關時事趣聞 All about New York.json

chunks.chunk_text: and the adventurous can order flavors ranging from pepperoni pizza to peanut butter and jellyWhile the Brooklyn dumpling shop in the city's East Village offers traditional pork and chicken bite-sized treatsChicken parm or Philly cheesesteak are also on the menuSpurt by the pandemic and technology advances
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_2024回顧星期天LBS - 紐約相關時事趣聞 All about New York.json

chunks.chunk_text: The Brooklyn dumpling shop is delivering food via automat 24 hours a day, 7 days a weekEmbrace technology, because technology is something that has to be embraced by hospitality business to thrive, said the shop's owner Stratis MorphogenNext article
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_2024回顧星期天LBS - 紐約相關時事趣聞 All about New York.json

chunks.chunk_text: The New York State Assembly has passed a bill that would allow people who do not identify as either male or female to use X as a marker to designate their sex on driver's licensesThe new marker would help transgender, non-binary and intersex individuals' identity be recognized in government documents, according to a statement from assembly speakers
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_2024回顧星期天LBS - 紐約相關時事趣聞 All about New York.json

chunks.chunk_text: The provisions in this bill will make life safer, reduce the stigma and affirm the identities for so many of our friends and neighbors, O'Donnell said in the statementNext article
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_2024回顧星期天LBS - 紐約相關時事趣聞 All about New York.json

chunks.chunk_text: For generations, taverns and saloons were largely places for men to gather, drink, gamble and chew tobaccoThose places could be discerning, as with Francis Tavern, a still-existent bar patronized in the 18th century
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_2024回顧星期天LBS - 紐約相關時事趣聞 All about New York.json

chunks.chunk_text: By the likes of George Washington and his soldiers, or more suited to the average Joe, like McSorley's Old Ale House, which opened in the mid-19th century and until 1970, admitted only menBy the time McSorley's had opened, many American bartenders had made a point of inventing what we now think of as craft cocktailsThe atmosphere at these locales were often
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_2024回顧星期天LBS - 紐約相關時事趣聞 All about New York.json

chunks.chunk_text: hostile and crudeProhibition changed all thatThe idea of bars as hospitable, welcoming spaces gained traction when liquor sales became illegalWith the advent of speakeasies, owners and bartenders suddenly had a new clientele, womenThe social appeal of speakeasies pulled them into new and vibrant communal spacesAlongside the new customers came barstools
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_2024回顧星期天LBS - 紐約相關時事趣聞 All about New York.json

chunks.chunk_text: live jazz and a new breed of cocktailsDespite the end of prohibition in 1933, these changes to New York's drinking culture endured, opening up the cocktail scene to a broader audienceBy the 1960s and into the 80s and 90s, bar culture in New York had become as varied and textured as the city itselfCocktail bars got yet another revival
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_2024回顧星期天LBS - 紐約相關時事趣聞 All about New York.json

chunks.chunk_text: at the Rainbow Room, where Dale DeGroff took over the drinks programIn the village, the Stonewall Inn and others became centers for gay culture, while uptown venues like the Shark Bar attracted a mostly African-American clienteleToday, despite an unfortunate turnover rate, modern New York cocktail bars are doing their best to foster a sense of community and hospitalityIt's this spirit
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_2024回顧星期天LBS - 紐約相關時事趣聞 All about New York.json

chunks.chunk_text: that an editorial writer for the Brooklyn Eagle captured in an 1885 column quoted by David Wondrich in his book, Unbibe, the modern American the paper observed looks for civility and he declines to go where rowdy instincts are rampantBut American bars are not by definition civilLuckily, it's as easy to find your watering hole fit today as it was a century ago
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_2024回顧星期天LBS - 紐約相關時事趣聞 All about New York.json

chunks.chunk_text: Good job and thanks for tuning in想要收聽更多過去的跟讀單元以及節目歡迎到我們官網www.15mens.today有興趣 John 老師以及其他資深英語老師對談的節目記得週末也要回來收聽我們同情學英語Catch you in the next one
